Premium tweak providing an enhanced TikTok experience.

**Download & Share:**
â€¢ Download videos without watermark
â€¢ Download photos as video (slideshow) with or without audio
â€¢ Download music directly
â€¢ Copy description and video/music links
â€¢ Choose download mode (share sheet or direct save)

**Profile:**
â€¢ Save profile pictures with long press
â€¢ Copy bio
â€¢ Show upload dates, like counts, and video counts
â€¢ Extended bio and comments

**Playback & Experience:**
â€¢ Auto-play next video
â€¢ Stop looping playback
â€¢ Skip recommendations and hide ads
â€¢ Disable warnings and sensitive content mask
â€¢ Upload region flag and preset playback speeds

**Licensing:**
â€¢ Secure license system via Patreon
â€¢ Transfer license to another device every 30 days

**Advanced Tools:**
â€¢ Reset settings and clear cache
â€¢ Arabic & English support

**Links:**
